title: Renault plans five product launches in 3 years; eyes double-digit sales growth this year
description: Auto manufacturer Renault is planning to launch five new products in the next three years in India. On Tuesday, Renault rolled out five new variants across its three models -- Kwid, Triber and Kiger -- as it looks to expand its customer base. Renew will be a standalone brand offering certified used cars sales and purchase, to both Renault and non-Renault models, the automaker said.
